title: NHL goals_against = None
body:
Hello,

goals against currently returns none for NHL teams.

If you were to run:

```
teams = Teams(year='2021')
for team in teams:
teams = Teams(year='2021')
    print(team.names)
    print(team.goals_against)  # Prints goals_against
```

It would return:
```
Philadelphia Flyers
None
Toronto Maple Leafs
None
Vegas Golden Knights
None
Washington Capitals
None
New Jersey Devils
None
Montreal Canadiens
None
Calgary Flames
None
Colorado Avalanche
None
St. Louis Blues
None
Winnipeg Jets
None
Detroit Red Wings
None
New York Islanders
None
Carolina Hurricanes
None
Florida Panthers
None
Nashville Predators
None
Tampa Bay Lightning
None
Minnesota Wild
None
Pittsburgh Penguins
None
Anaheim Ducks
None
Columbus Blue Jackets
None
Boston Bruins
None
Ottawa Senators
None
Arizona Coyotes
None
Buffalo Sabres
None
Edmonton Oilers
None
New York Rangers
None
Vancouver Canucks
None
Los Angeles Kings
None
San Jose Sharks
None
Chicago Blackhawks
None
Dallas Stars
None
```
